answers.answer: By the way, I'm 32 weeks today with 46 days to go, how about you all?
I will be 37 weeeks on Monday already 2cm dialated and 60% effaced with number #7 god willing , and WELCOME TO JULY

Greetings!  I'm 36 weeks, 60% effaced and 'a soft 1cm' dialted as of yesterday.  It's still going to be a few days/weeks for me - and I'm A-OK with that!  We still haven't made a decision on any cribs or any furniture...  This is baby number 1 for me.
Hello. I am 35 weeks as of today.  Welcome to July mommies forum.

Thanks everyone. Wow you guys are so close. My doctor hasnt started examining me just yet. My next appointment isnt until June 27th. When did your doctors start seeing you every week?Rukiyar this is number seven for you? your seventh child?! wow!
Yep 7th child (god willing) my fifth girl plus our two boys this should be my going out of business sale after her LOL

I had an appt at 26, 29, 32, 34, 36 - and now I'm on weekly appts.  I don't go in again until Friday afternoon but I'll be curious to see if there have been any changes in my status...  I'll tell ya there have been changes in the discharge!

Hello.  I'll be 36 weeks tomorrow, with a due date of July 16th.  However due to gestational diabetes and high blood pressure, my doctor is considering induction at 37 weeks.  So it could be as soon as a week for me!  I'm so excited to meet my little girl!
Wow!!!  I feel like it's going to be Aug for me (I know it won't...) - my BP has been great whenever I've gone in.  There has been no discussion of timing for me - it's anyone's guess!
Thanks for replying ladies, it's nice to read your posts.

question: It's not a question but a statement. Hi everyone, I'm so happy to be here with all you July baby mommys and daddys. I've recently was in the Aug baby forum until my doctor scheduled me for a C-section on July 29, 08. I'm so excited to be joining you all!
title: I'm New Here In July Babies, I Came From Aug Babies
